SourceText: What information does the app collect about you and how do we use it?
text: Ki informashon e aplikashon ta kolektá tokante di bo i kon nos ta us’é?

SourceText:
_Personal Data_
For the purpose of this @global.privacy_policy, 'personal data' means any information that enables us to identify an individual, directly or indirectly. There are two categories of data that are collected a) information on the facilitator/implementer who is using the app b) information on the parents/caregiver under guidance of said facilitator.

Data collected about the facilitator include:
-   Name
-   State (location)

Data collected about the parent / caregiver participant include:
-   Name
-   Parent ID
-   Co-parent
-   Attendance data of in-person / WhatsApp sessions

The processing of your personal data is primarily based on:

The @global.app_name team has legitimate interests in carrying out research activities, under Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR, regarding the sharing of limited details related to how you use the app.

_Log Data_
Whenever you use our app, we collect data and information (through third party services) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data includes information such as a truncated device Internet Protocol ("IP") address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilising our app, the time, date and your intentions within the app (which include but are not limited to any app buttons clicked or pages visited.)

_Cookies_
Cookies are small files that store data, often used to save user-specific information. They allow websites and apps to retrieve this stored information, enabling a more personalised and efficient user experience.

We use a number of third party services (see relevant section below) to support the functioning of the app. We use third party cookies through Firebase and GlitchTip and first party cookies through Matomo. In short, first-party cookies are from @global.app_name, and third-party cookies come from other places as described.

For further information on the handling of cookies see below:
- [GlitchTip](https://glitchtip.com/legal/privacy)
- [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy)
- [Matomo](https://matomo.org/blog/2020/02/web-analytics-cookies-gdpr/)

You have the option to adjust your browser settings to decline all or specific browser cookies or to notify you when sites initiate or access cookies. For android devices this should be done on the google chrome app. Remember, disabling cookies can affect the functionality of websites or web apps, as they may rely on these cookies for essential features. Always be sure about your decision before making these changes.

_Feedback Submissions_
Your feedback on the app is important to us. We shall always anonymise your personal information when sharing and publishing your feedback.

_Aggregate Data_
Your data is important to the @global.app_name team for broader research purposes. Aggregate data is always anonymised.
text:
_Datonan Personal_
Den kuadro di e @global.privacy_policy akí, ‘datonan personal’ ta nifiká kualke informashon ku ta permití nos identifiká un individuo, direktamente òf indirektamente. Tin dos kategoria di dato ku ta wòrdu kolektá a) informashon enkuanto e fasilitadó/implementadó ku ta usando e aplikashon b) informashon enkuanto e mayornan/dunadó di kuido bou di guia di e fasilitadó menshoná.

Datonan kolektá tokante e fasilitadó ta inkluí:
- Nòmber
- Estado (lokalidat)

Datonan kolektá tokante e partisipante di mayor/kuidadó ta inkluí:
- Nòmber
- Identifikashon di mayor
- Mayor ku ta kria yu huntu 
- Datonan di asistensia na seshonnan en persona / WhatsApp

E prosesamentu di bo datonan personal ta basá prinsipalmente riba:

E tim di @global.app_name tin interesnan legítimo den realisá aktividatnan di investigashon, bou di Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR, tokante e kompartimentu di detayenan limitá relashoná ku kon bo ta usa e aplikashon.

_Dato di Registrashon_
Kada bes ku bo usa nos aplikashon, nos ta kolektá dato i informashon (pa medio di servisio di terser partido) riba bo telefòn yamá Dato di Registrashon. E Dato di Registrashon akí ta inkluí informashon manera un adrès di Protokòl di Internèt  (“IP”) abreviá di un aparato, nòmber di aparato, vershon di sistema di operashon, e konfigurashon di e aplikashon ora di usa nos aplikashon, e ora, fecha i bo intenshonnan denter di e aplikashon (ku ta inkluí pero no ta limitá na kualke boton di aplikashon ku bo a klek òf páginanan bishitá.)

_'Cookies'_
'Cookies' ta archivonan chikitu ku ta warda dato, hopi bia usá pa warda informashon spesífiko di usuario. Nan ta permití wèpsaitnan i aplikashonnan pa rekuperá e informashon wardá akí, loke ta permití un eksperensia di usuario mas personalisá i efisiente.

Nos ta usa un kantidat di servisio di terser partido (wak sekshon relevante mas abou) pa sostené e funshonamentu di e aplikashon. Nos ta usa 'cookie' di terser partido pa medio di Firebase i GlitchTip i 'cookie' di promé partido pa medio di Matomo. Pues, 'cookie' di promé partido ta di @global.app_name, i 'cookie' di terser partido ta bini di otro lugánan manera deskribí.

Pa mas informashon tokante e maneho di 'cookie' wak akí abou:
- [GlitchTip](https://glitchtip.com/legal/privacy)
- [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy)
- [Matomo](https://matomo.org/blog/2020/02/web-analytics-cookies-gdpr/)

Bo tin e opshon pa ahustá bo konfigurashonnan di 'browser' pa rechasá tur  'cookies' òf 'cookies' spesífiko di 'browser' òf pa risibí notifikashon ora wèpsaitnan inisiá òf haña akseso na 'cookie'. Pa aparatonan 'android' mester hasi esaki riba e aplikashon di Google Chrome. Tene kuenta ku ora bo desaktivá 'cookies', esaki por afektá e funshonalidat di wèpsaitnan òf aplikashonnan di wèp, ya ku nan por dependé di e 'cookies' akí pa funshonnan esensial. Semper sòru pa bo ta sigur di bo desishon promé ku hasi e kambionan akí.

_Duna Opinion_
Bo opinion enkuanto e aplikashon ta importante pa nos. Semper nos lo anonimisá bo informashon personal ora di kompartí i publiká bo opinion.

_Dato Agregá_
Bo datonan ta importante pa e tim di @global.app_name pa propósitonan di investigashon mas amplio. Datonan agregá semper ta anónimo.

SourceText: How we get your personal information and why we collect it
text: Kon nos ta haña bo informashon personal i dikon nos ta kolektá esaki

SourceText:
We process your data to provide support to you as well as the data of parents and caregivers which facilitators support. We process your data to communicate when you contact us, for security reasons as well as research purposes (see section ‘Information Sharing’). 

The primary research purpose includes looking to investigate the extent to which @global.app_name can support facilitators in their interactions of parents and caregivers of young children. Parents and caregivers will be receiving primary parenting messages through ParentText (a chatbot) of which facilitators will be engaging with such parents over WhatsApp. During the course of research, the study team may use aggregated and anonymised data from the app for further research projects. Finally, please note that we may process your data without your knowledge or consent, where this is required or permitted by law.
text:
Nos ta prosesá bo datonan pa duna bo sosten i tambe e datonan di mayornan i dunadónan di kuido ku fasilitádonan ta sostené. Nos ta prosesá bo datonan pa komuniká ora bo tuma kontakto ku nos, pa motibunan di seguridat i tambe pa propósitonan di investigashon (mira sekshon ‘Kompartí Informashon’).

E propósito prinsipal di e investigashon ta inkluí buska pa investigá te na unda @global.app_name por sostené fasilitadónan den nan interakshonnan ku mayornan i kuidadónan di muchanan chikitu. Mayornan i dunadónan di kuido lo risibí mensahenan di edukashon familiar primario pa medio di ParentText (un 'chatbot'), di kua fasilitadónan lo ta den kontakto ku e mayornan ei via WhatsApp. Durante di investigashon, e tim di estudio por usa datonan agregá i anónimo for di e aplikashon pa mas proyekto di investigashon. Finalmente, por fabor tene na kuenta ku nos por prosesá bo datonan sin bo konosementu òf konsentimentu, kaminda esaki ta rekerí òf permití pa lei.
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Information Sharing
text: Kompartimentu di Informashon

SourceText:
Limited internal IDEMS staff may have access to log data collected via the app, as necessary to perform their duties regarding the operation of the app. These data will only be accessed on a need-to-know basis, and all team members with access to the data are bound to confidentiality.

You agree that your personal information may be shared with third parties such as researchers and partners involved in the improvement or implementation of the app including those outside your country. Prior to the disclosure of information with research partners we will make anonymous to the extent possible and where appropriate information such as log data. In reading and accepting this @global.privacy_policy, you permit us to use your anonymized data in published research.

You agree that we may transfer your log data outside your country, for example, to administer cloud services. We will ensure that any country, company or person that we pass your personal information to agrees to treat your information with the same level of protection as we are obliged to.

_Legal_
The information that we request will be retained by us and used as described in this @global.privacy_policy.
text:
Personal interno limitá di IDEMS por tin akseso na datonan di registro kolektá via di e aplikashon, segun ta nesesario pa kumpli ku nan tareanan pa loke ta trata e operashon di e aplikashon. Lo tin akseso na e datonan akí solamente riba un base di nesesidat i tur miembro di e tim ku tin akseso na e datonan ta mará na konfidensialidat.

Bo ta bai di akuerdo ku por kompartí bo informashon personal ku terser partidonan manera investigadónan i partnernan enbolbí den e mehorashon òf implementashon di e aplikashon inkluyendo esnan pafó di bo pais. Promé ku e divulgashon di informashon ku partnernan di investigashon nos lo hasi anónimo te na e grado ku ta posibel i kaminda ta apropiá, informashon manera dato di registrashon. Lesando i aseptando e @global.privacy_policy akí, bo ta permití nos usa bo datonan anónimo den investigashon publiká.

Bo ta bai di akuerdo ku nos por transferí bo datonan di registrashon pafó di bo pais, por ehèmpel, pa atministrá servisio di 'cloud'. Nos lo sòru pa kualke pais, kompania òf persona ku nos ta pasa bo informashon personal na dje ta bai di akuerdo pa trata bo informashon ku e mesun nivel di protekshon manera nos ta obligá na tin.

_Legal_
Nos lo retené e informashon ku nos pidi i lo usa esaki manera deskribí den e @global.privacy_policy akí.

SourceText: Third Party Service Providers and Websites
text: Proveedónan di Servisio di Terser Partido i Wèpsaitnan

SourceText:
The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you. We do so for the following reasons:
-   To facilitate our app
-   To provide the app on our behalf
-   To perform app-related services; or
-   To assist us in analysing how our app is used.

We want to inform users of this app that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.

Links to the privacy policies of third-party service providers used by the app:
-   [Google Play Services](https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/)
-   [Google Analytics for Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/policies/analytics)
-   [Sentry](https://sentry.io/privacy/)
-   [Matomo](https://matomo.org/privacy-policy/)
-   [GlitchTip](https://glitchtip.com/legal/privacy)

This app may contain links to other sites that are not covered by this @global.privacy_policy. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. This @global.privacy_policy applies only to the processing of your information by this app. It does not address, and we are not responsible for, the privacy, information, or other practices of any third parties, including any third party operating any site or service to which this app links to.
text:
E aplikashon ta usa servisio di terser partido ku por kolektá informashon usá pa identifiká bo. Nos ta hasi esaki pa e siguiente motibunan:
- Pa fasilitá nos aplikashon
- Pa proveé e aplikashon na nos nòmber
- Pa duna servisio relashoná ku e aplikashon; òf
- Pa asistí nos den analisá kon nos aplikashon ta wòrdu usá.

Nos ke informá usuarionan di e aplikashon akí, ku e terser partidonan akí tin akseso na bo Informashon Personal. E motibu ta pa hasi e tareanan asigná na nan, na nos nòmber. Sinembargo, nan ta obligá pa no divulgá òf usa e informashon pa kualke otro propósito.

Lenknan pa e polítikanan di privasidat di dunadónan di servisio di terser partido ku e aplikashon ta usa:
- [Google Play Services](https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/)
- [Google Analytics for Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/policies/analytics)
- [Sentry](https://sentry.io/privacy/)
- [Matomo](https://matomo.org/privacy-policy/)
- [GlitchTip](https://glitchtip.com/legal/privacy)

E aplikashon akí por kontené lenknan pa otro wèpsaitnan ku no ta kubri pa e @global.privacy_policy akí. Si bo klek riba un lenk di terser partido, lo bo wòrdu dirigí na e wèpsait ei. E @global.privacy_policy akí ta konta solamente pa e prosesamentu di bo informashon dor di e aplikashon akí. E no ta atendé i nos no ta responsabel pa, e privasidat, informashon, òf otro práktikanan di kualke terser partido, inkluyendo kualke terser partido ku ta operá kualke wèpsait òf servisio na kua e aplikashon akí ta di lenk na dje.

SourceText: How long do we keep your data?
text: Kuantu tempu nos ta warda bo datonan?

SourceText: We will retain your personal information for as long as we need it to fulfil our purposes, including any relating to app services as well as legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.
text: Nos lo retené bo informashon personal pa e kantidat di tempu ku nos mester di dje pa kumpli ku nos propósitonan, inkluyendo kualke proposito relashoná ku servisio di aplikashon i tambe rekisitonan legal, di kontabilidat òf di reportahe.

SourceText: How do we keep your data secure?
text: Kon nos ta tene bo datonan sigur?

SourceText: We value your trust in providing us your personal information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security. We also reserve the right to the storage of your data on third party servers or databases outside of the listed @global.app_name team (refer to the section on Third Party Service Providers and Websites). Therefore usage of the app is at your own risk.
text: Nos ta balorá bo konfiansa pa duna nos bo informashon personal, pues nos ta hasi esfuerso pa usa medionan komersialmente aseptabel pa proteh’é. Pero kòrda ku ningun método di transmishon via internèt, òf método di almasenamentu elektróniko ta 100% sigur i konfiabel, i nos no por garantisá su seguridat apsoluto. Nos ta reservá tambe e derecho riba e almasenamentu di bo datonan riba 'servers' òf basenan di dato di terser partido pafó di e tim @global.app_name menshoná (referí na e sekshon riba Proveedónan di Servisio di Terser Partido i Wèpsaitnan). P’esei uso di e aplikashon ta riba bo propio riesgo.
note: The string @global.app_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Children’s Privacy
text: Privasidat di Mucha

SourceText: This app is not targeted towards anyone under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from individuals under 18.
text: E aplikashon akí no ta dirigí na niun hende bou di edat di 18 aña. Nos no ta kolektá informashon personalmente identifikabel di personanan bou di 18 aña.

SourceText: Your data protection rights
text: Bo derechonan di protekshon di dato

SourceText:
Under data protection law, you have rights including:

_Your right of access_ - You have the right to ask us for copies of your personal information.

_Your right to rectification_ - You have the right to ask us to rectify personal information you think is inaccurate. You also have the right to ask us to complete information you think is incomplete.

_Your right to erasure_ - You have the right to ask us to erase your personal information in certain circumstances.

_Your right to withdraw consent for data processing at any time_ - You can choose to halt the processing of your data if consent was the legal basis for handling your information.

_Your right to restriction of processing_ - You have the right to ask us to restrict the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.

_Your right to object to processing_ - You have the right to object to the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.

_Your right to data portability_ - You have the right to ask that we transfer the personal information you gave us to another organisation, or to you, in certain circumstances.

You are not required to pay any charge for exercising your rights. Depending on the circumstances and the nature of your request it may not be possible for us to do what you have asked, for example, where there is a statutory or contractual requirement for us to process your data and it would not be possible to fulfil our legal obligations if we were to stop. Further information on your rights is available from the [Information Commissioner's Office (ICO)](https://ico.org.uk/for-organisations/uk-gdpr-guidance-and-resources/individual-rights/individual-rights/).
text:
Bou di lei di protekshon di dato, bo tin derechonan inkluyendo:

_Bo derecho di akseso_ - Bo tin e derecho di pidi nos kopianan di bo informashon personal.

_Bo derecho riba rektifikashon_ - Bo tin e derecho di pidi nos pa drecha informashon personal ku bo ta kere no ta eksakto. Tambe bo tin derecho di pidi nos pa kompletá informashon ku bo ta kere ta inkompleto.

_Bo derecho di eliminá_ - Bo tin e derecho di pidi nos pa eliminá bo informashon personal den sierto sirkunstansianan.

_Bo derecho di retirá konsentimentu pa prosesamentu di dato na kualke momento_ - Bo por skohe pa stòp e prosesamentu di bo datonan si konsentimentu tabata e base legal pa manehá bo informashon.

_Bo derecho riba restrikshon di prosesamentu_ - Bo tin e derecho di pidi nos pa restringí e prosesamentu di bo informashon personal den sierto sirkunstansianan.

_Bo derecho di oponé prosesamentu_ - Bo tin e derecho di oponé prosesamentu di bo informashon personal den sierto sirkunstansianan.

_Bo derecho riba portabilidat di dato_ - Bo tin e derecho di pidi pa nos transferí e informashon personal ku bo a duna nos na un otro organisashon, òf na abo, den sierto sirkunstansianan.

Bo no ta obligá di paga ningun kosto pa ehersé bo derechonan. Dependiendo di e sirkunstansianan i e naturalesa di bo petishon kisas no ta posibel pa nos hasi loke bo a pidi, por ehèmpel, kaminda tin un rekisito statutario òf kontraktual pa nos prosesá bo datonan i e lo no ta posibel pa kumpli ku nos obligashonnan legal si nos lo mester stòp. Mas informashon tokante bo derechonan ta disponibel serka e [Ofisina di Komishon di Informashon (ICO)](https://ico.org.uk/for-organisations/uk-gdpr-guidance-and-resources/individual-rights/individual-rights/).

SourceText: Removing the app
text: Kita e aplikashon

SourceText: We are sorry if you find our app no longer useful. Should you decide to remove our app, we may still retain some of your data (although anonymised) to troubleshoot, aid in investigations, comply with legal requirements or to add to our existing research data sets.
text: Nos diskulpa si bo no ta haña nos aplikashon útil mas. Si bo disidí di kita nos aplikashon, nos por retené algun di bo datonan (ounke anónimo) pa solushoná problema, yuda den investigashonnan, kumpli ku rekisitonan legal òf pa agregá na nos sètnan di dato di investigashon eksistente.

SourceText: Changes to the @global.privacy_policy
text: Kambionan na @global.privacy_policy
note: The string @global.privacy_policy should not be translated.

SourceText: We may update our @global.privacy_policy from time to time. You waive your right to be notified directly of changes and are advised to review this page periodically for any updates. Your continued use of the app suggests you agree to subsequent revisions of the @global.privacy_policy.
text: Nos por aktualisá nos @global.privacy_policy de bes en kuando. Bo ta renunsiá bo derecho di wòrdu notifiká direktamente di kambionan i ta wòrdu konsehá pa revisá e página akí periódikamente pa kualke aktualisashon. Bo uso kontinuo di e aplikashon ta sugerí ku bo ta bai di akuerdo ku siguiente revishonnan di e @global.privacy_policy.

SourceText:
If you have any questions or suggestions about our @global.privacy_policy, complaints or otherwise do not hesitate to contact us at <apps@idems.international>.

If your concerns are not adequately addressed, you retain the right to file a complaint with the Information Commissioner's Office. You can reach them at 03031231113, contact them via https://ico.org.uk/global/contact-us/, or mail to the Information Commissioner’s Office, Wycliffe House, Water Lane, Wilmslow, Cheshire, SK9 5AF, England, UK.

SourceText: User Agreement
text: Akuerdo di Usuario

SourceText: Rules of Usage
text: Reglanan di Uso

SourceText: @global.app_name is open-source, which means that its codebase can be found on GitHub for the wider software developer community. However, it's against the terms of use to alter the existing application or its materials, or to replicate any trademarks from the @global.app_name team. Although open source, refrain from translating the software into other languages or creating alternate versions without crediting the @global.app_name team. Unauthorised access to confidential user data is forbidden. It's not acceptable to provide false information about yourself when using the app, make unfounded claims of affiliation, or inaccurately report the app's behaviour. Ensure that your usage of the app adheres to all local rules and laws. Finally in accessing and using the app, we believe you not to be a minor in your country of residence.
text: @global.app_name ta 'open-source', loke ta nifiká ku su base di kódigo por wòrdu hañá riba GitHub pa e komunidat di desaroyadó di 'software' mas amplio. Sinembargo, ta kontra di e kondishonnan di uso pa alterá e aplikashon eksistente òf su materialnan, òf pa repliká kualke marka di e tim di @global.app_name. Ounke e ta 'open source', apstené di tradusí e 'software' den otro idiomanan òf krea vershonnan alternativo sin duna krédito na e tim di @global.app_name. Akseso no outorisá na datonan konfidensial di usuario ta prohibí. No ta aseptabel pa duna informashon falsu tokante bo mes ora di usa e aplikashon, hasi deklarashonnan infundá di afiliashon, òf reportá informe inkorekto tokante e komportashon di e aplikashon. Sòru pa bo uso di e aplikashon ta kumpli ku tur regla i lei lokal. Finalmente den akseso i uso di e aplikashon, nos ta asumí ku bo no ta un ménor di edat den bo pais di residensia.

SourceText: Content Changes
text: Kambionan di Kontenido

SourceText:
The @global.app_name team is committed to ensuring that the app is as useful and user friendly as possible. For that reason, we reserve the right to make changes to the app which will be delivered through updates. At present the app is free of charge and our intention is for it to stay that way.

In the future it is possible that some services may be offered that would incur a cost. We will never charge you for the app or its services without clearly making known to you first any access charges applicable.
text:
E tim di @global.app_name ta komprometé na garantisá ku e aplikashon ta mas útil i fásil pa usa posibel. Pa e motibu ei, nos ta reservá e derecho di hasi kambionan na e aplikashon ku lo wòrdu implementá pa medio di aktualisashonnan. Aktualmente e aplikashon ta grátis i nos intenshon ta pa e keda asina.

Ta posibel ku den futuro por ofresé algun servisio ku lo ta mará na gastu. Nos lo no kobra bo nunka pa e aplikashon òf su servisionan sin notifiká bo klaramente promé ku kualke gastu di akseso aplikabel.

SourceText: Use collaborative approach to learning
text: Usa aserkamentu di kolaborashon pa siña

SourceText:
In many other programmes, facilitators tell participants what to do and why it is important.

In @global.prog_name, we do things differently. We like to think of this as a collaborative and participatory approach to learning. As facilitators, you are collaborators or partners working with mothers, fathers, and caregivers to identify plans and practice solutions that will help them improve their lives at home.

It is helpful to think of mothers, fathers, and caregivers as experts who know their own children and circumstances. Many mothers, fathers, and caregivers will already be practising many positive ways of parenting their children. Others will be able to identify ways of improving their parenting on their own with guidance.

Our job is to support mothers, fathers, and caregivers learn for themselves how to achieve their goals. This sometimes means we have to work harder to ask the right sort of open-ended questions that will help mothers, fathers, and caregivers work out the benefits of positive parenting and nonviolent discipline for their children.

When mothers, fathers, and caregivers teach themselves, they learn a skill that will help them for a long time after the programme ends.
text:
Den hopi otro programa, fasilitadónan ta bisa partisipantenan kiko pa hasi i dikon e ta importante.

Den @global.prog_name, nos ta hasi kosnan diferente. Nos ta mira esaki komo un aserkamentu di kolaborashon i partisipashon pa siña. Komo fasilitadó, boso ta kolaboradó òf partner ku ta traha ku mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido pa identifiká plannan i praktiká solushonnan ku lo yuda nan mehorá nan bida na kas.

Ta bon pa pensa riba mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido komo ekspertonan ku konosé nan mes yunan i sirkunstansianan. Hopi mama, tata i dunadó di kuido lo ta praktikando hopi manera positivo di edukashon familiar ku nan yunan kaba. Otronan lo por identifiká maneranan di mehorá nan edukashon familiar riba nan mes ku guia.

Nos trabou ta pa sostené mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido pa siña pa nan mes kon pa logra nan metanan. Tin bia esaki ta nifiká ku nos mester traha mas duru pa hasi e tipo di preguntanan habrí korekto ku lo yuda mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido traha riba e benefisionan di edukashon familiar positivo i disiplina no violento pa nan yunan.

Ora mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido siña nan mes, nan ta siña un abilidat ku lo yuda nan pa hopi tempu despues ku e programa terminá.
note: The string @global.prog_name, should not be translated.

SourceText: Model the behaviour you want to see
text: Duna ehèmpel di e komportashon ku bo ke mira

SourceText:
The modelling principle forms the foundation of how we deliver @global.prog_name.

If we lead sessions in a collaborative approach, praise mothers, fathers, and caregivers often, practise active listening, and use positive instructions, mothers, fathers, and caregivers will do the same with their children.

Likewise, if we tell mothers, fathers, and caregivers what to do, criticise or laugh at them, ignore their needs or concerns, or only say what we do not want them to do, they will do the same.

Practise relaxation activities to help reduce your own stress. It can even just be taking a deep breath. Mothers, fathers, and caregivers will learn from your example and begin to mirror your behaviour.

In many ways, you are parenting the mothers, fathers, and caregivers in the way that you would like them to parent their children. It really works!
text:
E prinsipio di duna ehèmpel ta forma e fundeshi di kon nos ta implementá @global.prog_name.

Si nos guia seshonnan den un aserkamentu di kolaborashon, elogiá mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido ku frekuensia, praktiká skuchamentu aktivo i usa instrukshonnan positivo, mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido lo hasi meskos ku nan yunan.

Asina tambe, si nos bisa mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido kiko pa hasi, kritiká òf hari nan, ignorá nan nesesidatnan òf preokupashonnan, òf solamente bisa loke nos no ke pa nan hasi, nan lo hasi meskos.

Praktiká aktividatnan di relahashon pa yuda redusí bo propio strès. E por asta ta djis hala rosea profundo. Mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido lo siña for di bo ehèmpel i kuminsá reflehá bo komportashon.

Den hopi manera, bo ta edukando e mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido di e manera ku bo lo ke pa nan eduká nan yunan. E ta funshoná di bèrdat!
note: The string @global.prog_name. should not be translated.

SourceText: Go at the pace of the group
text: Bai segun e ritmo di e grupo

SourceText:
You should always go at your mothers, fathers, and caregivers’ pace when delivering the programme. Make sure that the mothers, fathers, and caregivers in your group have understood the current content before moving on to new content.

This may mean that you take extra time problem-solve issues that come up during the sessions.
text:
Semper bo mester bai segun e ritmo di e mama, tata i dunadónan di kuido ora di implementá e programa. Sòru pa e mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido den bo grupo a komprondé e kontenido aktual promé ku pasa pa kontenido nobo.

Esaki por nifiká ku bo ta tuma tempu èkstra pa solushoná problema ku ta surgi durante e seshonnan.

SourceText: Make @global.prog_name a happy and safe space to learn
text: Hasi @global.prog_name un espasio dushi i sigur pa siña
note: The string @global.prog_name should not be translated.

SourceText:
Everyone likes a place that is warm and inviting. Tips for facilitators to make @global.prog_name a happy place to learn:

Invite mothers, fathers, and caregivers to participate: Notice when someone is holding back and ask if he or she wishes to share an opinion or experience.
Mention that this is a safe and empathetic space where no one will be judged. Experiences shared within the group will be kept confidential.
Make sure that everyone in the room can hear you (and each other).
Sit when you are talking. Be on the same level as the mothers, fathers, and caregivers and sit among them. If possible, try to sit among the mothers, fathers, and caregivers instead of at the front of the group.
Create a comfortable and welcoming place to meet.
Make sure there are enough chairs and that the room is clean. In the summer, use a fan or an air conditioner (if available). You can even decorate the room if you want!
Establish the language needs of the participants.
Respect whatever a parent shares with the group.
There will be lots of laughter in the group but try to laugh with not at a parent even if what they say sounds ridiculous. 
Praise mothers, fathers, and caregivers for their effort and dedication.
Model the behaviour you want from the mothers, fathers, and caregivers in the way that you treat them.
Praise, respect, and reflect on mothers, fathers, and caregivers’ contributions.
text:
Tur hende ta gusta un lugá ku ta kaluroso i kaminda bo ta sinti bo bon biní. Tepnan pa fasilitadónan pa hasi @global.prog_name un lugá dushi pa siña:

Invitá mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido pa partisipá: Tuma nota ora un hende wanta su mes atras i puntra si e ta deseá di kompartí un opinion òf eksperensia.
Menshoná ku esaki ta un espasio seif i ku empatia kaminda lo no husga niun hende. Eksperensianan kompartí den e grupo lo keda konfidensial.
Sòru pa tur hende den e kamber por tende bo (i tende otro).
Sinta ora bo ta papiando. Ta na e mesun nivel ku e mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido i sinta meimei di nan. Si ta posibel, purba di sinta meimei di e mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido en bes di sinta dilanti di e grupo.
Krea un lugá kómodo i ku ta hasi hende sinti nan mes bon biní pa topa.
Sòru pa tin sufisiente stul i ku e kamber ta limpi. Den temporada di hopi kalor, usa un fèn òf un èrko (si esakinan ta disponibel). Bo por asta dekorá e kamber si bo ke!
Establesé e nesesidatnan di idioma di e partisipantenan.
Respetá loke ku un mayor ta kompartí ku e grupo.
Lo tin hopi harimentu den e grupo pero purba hari ku e mayor i no hari e mayor ounke loke nan ta bisa ta zona ridíkulo.
Elogiá mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido pa nan esfuerso i dedikashon.
Duna ehèmpel di e komportashon ku bo ke di e mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido dor di e manera ku bo ta trata nan.
Elogiá, respetá i reflehá riba e kontribushonnan di mamanan, tatanan i dunadónan di kuido.
note: The string @global.prog_name should not be translated.

SourceText:
The core programme focuses on one module each week over six weeks. 
The core modules are presented in this order: 

Module 1 – Introduction and spending one-on-one time with your child

Module 2 – Talking about feelings

Module 3 – Keeping it Positive: Giving instructions & delivering praise

Module 4 – Keeping your child safe with household rules & routines

Module 5 – Positive discipline: Using redirect and consequences

Module 6 – Problem-solving with children & final reflection
text:
E programa sentral ta enfoká riba un módulo kada siman durante seis siman.
Ta presentá e módulonan sentral den e sekuensia akí:

Módulo 1 – Introdukshon i tempu pa abo ku bo yu

Módulo 2 – Papia riba emoshon

Módulo 3 – Keda positivo: Duna instrukshon & duna elogio 

Módulo 4 – Mantené bo yu seif ku reglanan di kas i rutinanan diario

Módulo 5 – Disiplina positivo: Usa método di rederigí i konsekuensianan 

Módulo 6 – Resolvé problema huntu ku mucha i reflekshon final

SourceText:
The key approach to @global.prog_name is that we draw on the shared wisdom and experience of our parents to help brainstorm and problem-solve the challenges we want to tackle at home. That means that we want everybody to pool their ideas so that we all develop and practice new skills. 

Parents are welcome to share in whatever way they are most comfortable: text or audio messages. 

The foundation for this programme is the idea that parents want to strengthen their relationships with their kids in order to build a healthy home. That’s why they are here! 

The programme encourages positive interactions between parents and kids by helping parents to develop skills around praising good behaviour, spending quality time, and talking about feelings. 

If parents are spending time reinforcing positive behaviours with praise, then parents will have to do less work managing problem behaviours. 

Other skills that the programme introduces to manage unwanted behaviours include ignoring and redirecting negative attention-seeking behaviours and introducing consequences. 

The notion that children are kept safe by establishing rules and routines, planning for any risks, and surrounding them with as much care as possible underscores the entire programme.

The programme uses online messaging platforms that are familiar to parents (e.g., WhatsApp, Viber, Telegram, Facebook Messenger, etc.). 

The main teaching method in this programme is to do activities together to enable learning through doing instead of learning through being told. This method helps participants to learn both during the sessions and at home. 

This is because we all remember and understand things much better when we have done them ourselves.
text:
E aserkamentu klave pa @global.prog_name ta ku nos ta usa e sabiduria i eksperensia kompartí di nos mayornan pa yuda pensa huntu i solushoná problema pa loke ta trata e retonan ku nos ke atendé na kas. Esei ta nifiká ku nos ke pa tur hende pone nan ideanan huntu pa nos tur desaroyá i praktiká abilidatnan nobo.

Mayornan ta bon biní pa kompartí den kualke manera ku nan ta mas kómodo: mensahenan di teksto òf oudio.

E fundeshi pa e programa akí ta e idea ku mayornan ke fortalesé nan relashonnan ku nan yunan pa asina konstruí un kas saludabel. Ta p’esei nan ta akí!

E programa ta enkurashá interakshonnan positivo entre mayornan i muchanan dor di yuda mayornan desaroyá abilidatnan ku ta enserá elogiá bon komportashon, pasa tempu di kalidat i papia tokante sintimentunan.

Si mayornan ta dediká tempu na reforsá komportashonnan positivo ku elogio, e ora ei mayornan lo mester hasi ménos trabou pa manehá komportashonnan problemátiko.

Otro abilidatnan ku e programa ta introdusí pa manehá komportashonnan indeseá ta inkluí ignorá i redirigí komportashonnan negativo di buska atenshon i introdusí konsekuensianan.

E idea ku ta tene muchanan seif dor di establesé reglanan i rutinanan, plania pa kualke riesgo, i rondoná nan ku mas tantu kuido posibel ta enfatisá henter e programa.

E programa ta usa plataformanan di mensahe ònlain ku ta konosí pa mayornan (p.e., WhatsApp, Viber, Telegram, Facebook Messenger, etc.).

E método prinsipal di enseñansa den e programa akí ta pa hasi aktividatnan huntu pa permití siñamentu dor di hasi en bes di siña dor di wòrdu bisá kiko pa hasi. E método akí ta yuda e partisipantenan siña tantu durante e seshonnan komo na kas.

Esaki ta pasobra nos tur ta kòrda i komprondé kosnan muchu mas mihó ora nos mes a hasi nan.
note: The string @global.prog_name should not be translated.

SourceText:
The @global.prog_name introduces many concepts and practices that are new to parents. Sometimes, participants will initially resist learning a new approach with their children. Other times, they will have difficulty understanding some of the more complex practices like distinguishing between punishment and discipline. Facilitators should always go at the participants’ pace when delivering the programme. 

Make sure that the participants in your group have learned a specific parenting or relationship building skill before moving on to the next one.
text:
E @global.prog_name ta introdusí hopi konsepto i práktika ku ta nobo pa mayornan. Tin bia, partisipantenan lo resistí na promé instante pa siña un aserkamentu nobo ku nan yunan. Otro bia, nan lo tin difikultat pa komprondé algun di e práktikanan mas kompleho manera distinguí entre straf i disiplina. Fasilitadónan semper mester bai segun e ritmo di e partisipantenan ora di fasilitá e programa.

Sòru pa e partisipantenan den bo grupo a siña un abilidat spesífiko di edukashon familiar òf di konstruí relashon promé ku pasa pa e siguiente.
note: The string @global.prog_name should not be translated.

SourceText:
A-E-C-P is a core building block in the collaborative approach to facilitating the @global.prog_name. It is also important to model Active Listening so that parents begin to do the same with their own children. 
We like to think of 4 key steps facilitating a discussion with the participants:  Acceptance, Exploration, Connection, and Practice.
text:
A-E-K-P ta un elemento esensial den e aserkamentu di kolaborashon pa fasilitá e @global.prog_name. Tambe ta importante pa duna ehèmpel di Skuchamentu Aktivo pa asina mayornan kuminsá hasi meskos ku nan mes yunan.
Nos ta usa 4 paso klave ku ta fasilitá un diskushon ku e partisipantenan: Aseptashon, Eksplorashon, Konekshon i Práktika.
note: The string @global.prog_name. should not be translated.

SourceText:
It is important to be aware of different competencies and characteristics of children at different stages. 
The characteristics of children can shape parents’ expectations, goals, and activities with their children. 

It may be that the challenges and problems that parents face are rooted in expecting children to behave in ways that they are not yet developmentally ready for.
text:
Ta importante pa ta konsiente di diferente kompetensia i karakterístika di muchanan den diferente fase.
E karakterístikanan di muchanan por forma e ekspektativanan, metanan i aktividatnan di mayornan ku nan yunan.

E por ta asina ku e retonan i problemanan ku mayornan ta enfrentá tin di aber ku mayornan ta spera ku na yunan ta komportá nan mes na maneranan ku nan no ta kla pe ainda segun nan desaroyo.

SourceText:
Thank you for being a @global.prog_name Facilitator. We know that you will put a lot of time and energy into learning this programme and finding new ways to work with families. 

We know that you are doing this because you want to help people who are struggling. You are the heroes of helping families in our communities, but that doesn’t mean it’s not important to have fun, too! 

Ways in which facilitators can make @global.prog_name group sessions a fun place to learn:
Send songs and pictures
Use Emojis
Tell stories
Encourage parents to be creative with how they share
text:
Danki pa ta un Fasilitadó di @global.prog_name. Nos sa ku lo bo hinka hopi tempu i energia den siña e programa akí i buska maneranan nobo pa traha ku famianan.

Nos sa ku boso ta hasi esaki pasobra boso ke yuda hende ku ta luchando. Boso ta e héroenan di yuda famianan den nos komunidatnan, pero esei no ta nifiká ku no ta importante pa disfrutá tambe!

Maneranan den kua fasilitadónan por hasi seshonnan di grupo di @global.prog_name un lugá dushi pa siña:
Manda kantika i potrèt
Usa 'Emojis'
Konta historianan
Enkurashá mayornan pa ta kreativo ku kon nan ta kompartí

SourceText:
It is important to know the following guidelines for handling disclosures of abuse, neglect, and violence from participants:

1️⃣ **Understand abuse, neglect and exploitation.**

❗ **Abuse** refers to a deliberate act of maltreatment that can damage a boy or girl’s security, wellbeing, dignity and development. Abuse includes all forms of physical, sexual, psychological and emotional maltreatment. (Save the Children definition)

❗ **Violence** against girls and boys is defined as forms of physical or mental violence, damage and abuse, neglect or neglectful treatment or maltreatment or exploitation, including sexual abuse. (Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights, 1990,
Article 19)

❗ **Child exploitation** refers to using girls and boys for economic or sexual benefit, gratification or profit, often resulting in unjust, cruel and harmful treatment of the girl or boy. (Save the Children definition)

2️⃣ **Know your organisation’s child safeguarding policies and referral procedures.**

📖 All organisations should have or develop child rights safeguarding policies and referral procedures, including details on how to respond appropriately when a caregiver, other adults, girl or boy discloses abuse. 

📝 You should have accurate knowledge of all protocols and response plans. These will tell you what to do within your organisation if a caregiver or girl or boy reports abuse (e.g. who to report to, internal resources for supporting the girl or boy), as well as how to engage outside resources (e.g. local referral pathways, when to engage with authorities). 

🔑 It is your responsibility to act regardless of whether you are responding to disclosures of past and/or present abuse. However, you are not responsible for resolving the situation on your own. It is important that you discuss the situation with your supervisor to agree on what steps to take next.

3️⃣ **Ensure parents know that you are someone who can help.**

🌷Parents participating in your sessions need to know that they can come to you for help, regardless of when the abuse occurred. 

👂You should make sure that they know that they can trust you and that you will listen and support them without judgement or any further harm.
text:
Ta importante pa sa e siguiente instrukshonnan pa manehá divulgashonnan di abusu, negligensia i violensia di partisipantenan:

1️⃣ **Komprondé abusu, negligensia i eksplotashon.**

❗ **Abusu** ta referí na un akto deliberadamente di maltrato ku por daña un mucha hòmber òf mucha muhé su seguridat, bienestar, dignidat i desaroyo. Abusu ta enserá tur forma di maltrato físiko, seksual, sikológiko i emoshonal. (Definishon di Save the Children)

❗ **Violensia** kontra mucha muhé i mucha hòmber ta definí komo formanan di violensia físiko òf mental, daño i abuso, negligensia òf trato negligente òf maltrato òf eksplotashon, inkluyendo abusu seksual. (Ofisina di Alto Komisario pa Derechonan Humano, 1990,
Artíkulo 19)

❗ **Eksplotashon di mucha** ta referí na uso di mucha muhé i mucha hòmber pa benefisio ekonómiko òf seksual, gratifikashon òf ganashi, ku hopi bia ta resulltá den trato inhustu, kruel i dañino di e mucha muhé òf mucha hòmber. (Definishon di Save the Children)

2️⃣ **Konosé e maneho di protekshon di mucha di bo organisashon i e proseduranan di referensia.**

📖 Tur organisashon mester tin òf mester desaroyá maneho di protekshon di derechonan di mucha i proseduranan di referensia, inkluyendo detayenan riba kon pa respondé apropiadamente ora un dunadó di kuido, otro adultonan, mucha muhé òf mucha hòmber revelá abusu.

📝 Bo mester tin konosementu eksakto di tur protokòl i plan di di kon pa respondé. Esakinan lo bisa bo kiko pa hasi den bo organisashon si un dunadó di kuido òf mucha muhé òf mucha hòmber reportá abusu (p.e. na ken pa reportá, rekursonan interno pa sostené e mucha muhé òf mucha hòmber), i tambe kon pa enbolbí rekursonan di pafó (p.e. trayektonan di referensia lokal, ki ora pa enbolbí outoridatnan).

🔑 Ta bo responsabilidat pa aktua sin importá si bo ta respondiendo na divulgashonnan di abusu di pasado i/òf presente. Sinembargo, bo no ta responsabel pa resolvé e situashon riba bo mes. Ta importante pa bo papia tokante e situashon ku bo supervisor pa bai di akuerdo riba ki pasonan pa tuma siguientemente.

3️⃣ **Perkurá pa mayornan sa ku bo ta un hende ku por yuda.**

🌷Mayornan ku ta partisipá na bo seshonnan mester sa ku nan por pasa serka bo pa yudansa, sin importá ki ora e abusu a tuma lugá.

👂Bo mester sòru pa nan sa ku nan por konfia bo i ku lo bo skucha i sostené nan sin huisio òf sin mas daño.

SourceText:
**During disclosure:**

💚 Provide a safe environment in which the participant can share their story.

👂 Listen carefully to the participant and take notes: what/when/where/who.

❗ Determine if the participant is in immediate danger and what help is available.

💙 Make sure that the participant feels that you believe him/her.

🌷 Let them know they have done the right thing by sharing their story with you.

✨ Be supportive and free of judgement in your responses – avoid blaming at all times!

➡️ Let the participant know that you will share what he/she told you with your supervisor to find a way to support and protect him/her.

📝 Explain what you are going to do next.

 ✅ Notify @global.supervisor_name

❗Remember that it is not your obligation to solve the situation, but you must report it to your supervisors for follow-up. Don't try to solve it alone.
text:
**Durante di divulgashon:**

💚 Perkurá pa un ambiente seif den kua e partisipante por kompartí su historia.

👂 Skucha e partisipante bon i tuma nota: kiko/ki ora/unda/ken.

❗ Determiná si e partisipante ta den peliger inmediato i ki yudansa tin disponibel.

💙 Sòru pa e partisipante sinti ku bo ta kere den dje.

🌷 Laga nan sa ku nan a hasi e kos korekto dor di kompartí nan historia ku bo.

✨ Duna bo sosten i sòru pa bo kontesta ta liber di huisio – evitá di tira falta na tur momentu!

➡️ Laga e partisipante sa ku lo bo kompartí loke el a bisa bo ku bo supervisor pa haña un manera pa sosten'é i proteh’é.

📝 Splika kiko bo ta bai hasi despues. 

✅ Notifiká @global.supervisor_name

❗Kòrda ku no ta bo obligashon pa solushoná e situashon, pero bo mester informá esaki na bo supervisornan pa por tuma e pasonan nesesario. No purba di solushon’é bo so.
note: The string @global.supervisor_name should not be translated.

SourceText:
**After disclosure:**

❌ Avoid engaging with the alleged abuser – that may make things worse and make next steps difficult. It could also jeopardise future legal proceedings.

🌷 You are not alone. Get help from your supervisor to agree on the next steps.
text:
**Despues di divulgashon:**

❌ Evitá di enbolbí ku e supuesto abusadó – esei por hasi kosnan pió i hasi e siguiente pasonan difísil. Esaki por stroba tambe prosedimentunan legal den futuro.

🌷 Bo no ta bo so. Buska yudansa di bo supervisor pa bai di akuerdo ku e siguiente pasonan.

SourceText:
Special thanks are due to the caregivers who participated in focus groups and shared their insights, helping to shape the programme around real needs. We also acknowledge the program facilitators—from social workers and school administrators to community psychologists and NGO partners—whose feedback during has helped ground the programme in everyday practice.

Finally, we thank all the families who participated in the project and shared with us their parenting goals, challenges, and triumphs. This app is dedicated to YOU.
text:
Danki spesial ta bai na e dunadónan di kuido ku a partisipá den gruponan di enfoke i a kompartí nan punto di bista, yudando pa forma e programa rònt di nesesidatnan real. Nos ta rekonosé tambe e fasilitadónan di e programa—for di trahadónan sosial i atministradónan di skol te na sikólogonan di komunidat i partnernan di NGO—kende nan komentario durante e proseso a kontribuí pa integrá e programa den práktikanan di bida di tur dia.

Finalmente, nos ta gradisí tur e famianan ku a partisipá den e proyekto i a kompartí ku nos nan metanan, retonan i triunfonan pa loke ta trata edukashon familiar. E aplikashon akí ta dediká na ABO.

SourceText: Hello! I look forward to hearing how the rest of your week goes when we next meet on [ENTER DATE HERE]. Chat then!
text: Kon a bai! Mi ta spera di tende kon e sobra di bo siman a bai ora nos topa otro riba [ENTER DATE HERE]. Nos lo 'chat' e ora ei!

SourceText: Replace [ENTER DATE HERE] with the date of the chat session
text: Remplasá [ENTER DATE HERE] ku e fecha di e seshon di 'chat'

SourceText:
Hello! Remember this week’s home practice is to try to talk about emotions with your children during one-on-one time and other times during the week. 

Talking about emotions helps children learn that all feelings are okay—even the big or tricky ones. This makes it easier for them to understand themselves and talk to you about what they’re going through. 😊💬
text:
Kon a bai! Kòrda ku e práktika di kas di e siman akí ta pa purba papia tokante emoshonnan ku bo yunan durante tempu huntu i otro momentunan durante di siman. 

Papia tokante emoshonnan ta yuda muchanan siña ku tur sintimentu ta bon—asta esnan grandi òf difísil. Esaki ta hasié mas fásil pa nan komprondé nan mes i papia ku bo tokante loke nan ta pasando aden. 😊💬

SourceText: Can you believe that a whole week has gone by? Our next chat session will be later at [INSERT DATE & TIME]. We will continue learning about the benefits of talking about emotions with our children. Chat soon!
text: Bo por kere ku henter un siman a pasa? Nos siguiente seshon di 'chat' lo ta mas despues riba [INSERT DATE & TIME]. Nos lo sigui siña tokante e benefisionan di papia tokante emoshonnan ku nos yunan. Nos lo 'chat' pronto!

SourceText:
Hello! Keep spending 5 minutes of one-on-one time with your child every day. Remember to practice keeping your instructions positive, realistic, and specific and to praise your children for following instructions. 

Some of things you can praise your child for are playing quietly, talking respectfully to others, and helping with chores around the house. 

Thank you for your commitment and dedication to your children!
text:
Kon a bai! Sigui pasa 5 minüt di tempu abo ku bo yu tur dia. Kòrda praktiká pa tene bo instrukshonnan positivo, realístiko i spesífiko i pa elogiá bo yunan pa sigui instrukshonnan. 

Algun di e kosnan ku bo por elogiá bo yu p’e ta hunga trankil, papia ku rèspèt ku otronan i yuda ku trabounan di kas. 

Danki pa boso kompromiso i dedikashon na boso yunan!

SourceText: Hello! Can you believe that another week has gone by? Our next chat session will be later at [INSERT DATE & TIME]. We will continue chatting about how to get your children to follow instructions. Chat soon!
text: Kon a bai! Bo por kere ku un siman mas a pasa? Nos siguiente seshon di 'chat' lo ta mas despues riba [INSERT DATE & TIME]. Nos lo sigui kòmbersá tokante kon pa logra pa bo yunan sigui instrukshonnan. Nos lo 'chat' pronto!

SourceText:
Hello! You should try to involve your children and other members of your household when making new rules and routines. These can be around bedtime, schoolwork or chores. 

It is perfectly normal for children to test out rules before making them a normal part of the routine. Soon these rules and routines will just feel like a normal part of your household and day. Daily routines can help create a sense of security in the household. 

Thank you!
text:
Kon a bai! Bo mester purba di enbolbí bo yunan i otro miembronan di bo kas ora di traha regla i rutinanan nobo. Esakinan por ta rònt di ora di bai drumi, hùiswèrk òf trabounan di kas. 

Ta mashá normal pa muchanan tèst reglanan promé ku hasi nan un parti normal di e rutina. Pronto e reglanan i rutinanan akí lo sinti manera djis un parti normal di bo hogar i di bo dia. Rutinanan diario por yuda krea un sentido di seguridat den e kas. 

Danki!

SourceText: Hello! Remember that using new ways to discipline your children takes practice! Try to make sure that consequences should be fair and realistic. They are best used when your child forgets a household rule or refuses to follow an instruction.
text: Kon a bai! Kòrda ku usa maneranan nobo pa disipliná bo yunan ta rekerí práktika! Purba di sòru pa konsekuensianan ta hustu i realístiko. E mihó momentu pa usa esakinan ta ora bo yu lubidá un regla di kas òf nenga di sigui un instrukshon.

SourceText: Home practise reminder
text: Rekordatorio di práktika di kas

SourceText: It is really important to remember to Keep It Positive! Continue to spend quality time with your children, use positive instructions, and praise them when they are behaving well. The more positive attention they receive for good behaviour, the less you will have to discipline them!
text: Ta realmente importante pa kòrda pa Keda Positivo! Sigui pasa tempu di kalidat ku bo yunan, usa instrukshonnan positivo i elogiá nan ora nan ta komportá nan mes bon. Mas atenshon positivo nan haña pa bon komportashon, ménos bo lo mester disipliná nan!

SourceText: Prompt for new admin
text: Solisitut pa administradó nobo

SourceText: As we start thinking ahead beyond the end of the programme, would anyone like to consider taking on the administrator role for our chat group? DM if you are interested! Thank you!

SourceText: Hello and thanks for being part of the@global.prog_name chat! I am thrilled to be able to chat together about how we can best support our children to grow up healthy and happy. Today, we are going to chat about spending One-on-One time with your children.
text: Kon a bai i danki pa forma parti di e 'chat' di@global.prog_name! Mi ta entusiasmá di por kòmbersá huntu tokante kon nos por sostené nos yunan mihó pa krese salú i felis. Awe, nos ta bai 'chat' tokante pasa tempu abo ku bo yunan.
note: The string the@global.prog_name should not be translated.

SourceText: Message 2: Introductions
text: Mensahe 2: Introdukshonnan

SourceText: Let’s introduce ourselves! Please share your name and your goal for the programme. As an example, my name is [INSERT NAME] and I want to learn more about how to help my child go to bed by 8 every night. Feel free to add your own to the chat using text or audio message.
text: Ban introdusí nos mes! Por fabor kompartí bo nòmber i bo meta pa e programa. Komo ehèmpel, mi nòmber ta [INSERT NAME] i mi ke siña mas tokante kon pa yuda mi yu bai drumi 8 or' tur anochi. Sinti bo liber pa agregá bo mes na e 'chat' usando mensahe di teksto òf oudio.

SourceText: Allow some time for parents to share.  Remember to praise each response. For example, you can say “Thanks for the response, [Insert Name]!” or “Great goal, [Insert Name]!”
text: Permití algun tempu pa mayornan kompartí. Kòrda elogiá kada kontesta. Por ehèmpel, bo por bisa “Danki pa e kontesta, [Insertá Nòmber]!” òf “Bon meta, [Insertá Nòmber]!”

SourceText: Message 3: Ground rules
text: Mensahe 3: Reglanan básiko

SourceText: Thanks so much for sharing! To make this a safe space to communicate openly let’s look at the ground rules for this chat group again.
text: Masha danki pa kompartí! Pa hasi esaki un espasio seif pa komuniká habrí laga nos wak e reglanan básiko pa e grupo di 'chat' akí atrobe.

SourceText: Send the image of ground rules for your in-person session

SourceText: Message 5: Voting on a challenge to discuss
text: Mensahe 5: Votashon riba un reto pa diskutí

SourceText:
If you gave a thumbs up — amazing! 🎉If you face some challenges during one-on-one time, that's completely normal. You’re not alone! Here are some common challenges caregivers have experienced. Vote for the one you’d like us to talk about together:

1️⃣ I didn’t have enough time
2️⃣ My child did not want to spend time with me
3️⃣ All my child wanted to do was watch TV or play with a gadget
4️⃣ My child wanted to do things I felt uncomfortable about
text:
Si bo a duna un dùim ariba — master! 🎉Si bo ta enfrentá algun reto durante tempu pa abo ku bo yu, esei ta kompletamente normal. Bo no ta bo so! Akí tin algun reto komun ku dunadónan di kuido a eksperensiá. Vota pa esun ku bo ke pa nos papia riba dje huntu:

1️⃣ Mi no tabatin sufisiente tempu
2️⃣ Mi yu no tabata ke pasa tempu ku mi
3️⃣ Tur loke mi yu tabata ke hasi tabata wak televishon òf hunga ku un aparato
4️⃣ Mi yu tabata ke hasi kosnan ku mi tabata sinti mi inkómodo kuné

SourceText: Message 6: Discussing solution
text: Mensahe 6: Diskutiendo riba solushon

SourceText: Message 7: Open Feedback

SourceText: Thanks for discussing that challenge with me! Does anyone have any other challenges you’d like us to troubleshoot together? Feel free to share — we’re here to support each other!
text: Danki pa papia tokante e reto ei ku mi! Tin hende ku tin otro retonan ku bo ke pa nos solushoná huntu? Sinti bo liber pa kompartí — nos tei pa sostené otro!

SourceText: 👋 Hey there! It’s time for another parenting story. Today’s story is about helping your children to manage their feelings.
text: 👋 Hei! Ta tempu pa un otro historia di edukashon familiar. E historia di awe ta tokante yuda bo yunan manehá nan emoshonnan.

SourceText: Let’s see a story of parents talking about a difficult emotion with their teen
text: Laga nos wak un historia di mayornan ku ta papia tokante un emoshon difísil ku nan tiner

SourceText: 💡Here are 5 things about how to talk about emotions with your children & your home activity for the week.
text: 💡Aki tin 5 kos tokante kon pa papia tokante emoshon ku bo yunan & bo aktividat di kas pa e siman.

SourceText: Welcome to Module 2 of @global.prog_name! How is everybody doing? Happy? Stressed? Angry? Annoyed? Peaceful? Whatever emotion you feel…it’s okay! Please feel free to share how you are feeling today.
text: Bon Biní na Módulo 2 di @global.prog_name! Kon ta bai ku tur hende? Kontentu? Di strès? Rabiá? Fadá? Trankil? Kualke emoshon ku bo sinti…ta bon! Por fabor sinti bo liber pa kompartí kon bo ta sinti awe.
note: The string @global.prog_name! should not be translated.

SourceText: Allow time for parents to share how they are feeling. You should also share how you are feeling. For example, “I am happy to be part of the chat today.”
text: Permití tempu pa mayornan kompartí kon nan ta emoshon. Bo mester kompartí tambe kon bo ta sinti. Por ehèmpel, “Mi ta kontentu di ta parti di e 'chat' awe.”

SourceText: I appreciate you opening up about that! Are there any other challenging moments you’ve run into? You’re welcome to bring them up, this is a space where we can help each other out.
text: Mi ta apresiá ku bo ta habrí tokante esei! Tin otro momentunan difísil ku bo a topa kuné? Bo ta bon biní pa trese nan dilanti, esaki ta un espasio kaminda nos por yuda otro.

SourceText: Thanks for sharing that! Have you come across any other difficult situations lately? Feel free to share, this is a space where we can support one another.
text: Danki pa kompartí esei! Bo a topa ku otro situashonnan difísil últimamente? Sinti bo liber pa kompartí, esaki ta un espasio kaminda nos por sostené otro.

SourceText: Now let’s move on to the parenting tip. Here are 3 steps to help you to get your children to follow your instructions more often:
text: Awor laga nos sigui pa e tep di edukashon familiar. Akí 3 paso pa yuda bo pa gana bo yunan pa sigui bo instrukshonnan ku mas frekuensia:

SourceText: Allow time for parents to share how they are feeling.
text: Permití tempu pa mayornan kompartí kon nan ta sinti.

SourceText: Choose the challenge with the highest vote. Encourage parents to work together to identify positive solutions. Here are some possible challenges and solutions.
text: Skohe e reto ku e voto mas haltu. Enkurashá mayornan pa traha huntu pa identifiká solushonnan positivo. Akí tin algun posibel reto i solushon.

SourceText:
Before we end today’s module let’s take a pause together. Remember that this is something you can do whenever you are feeling stressed, or your children are annoying you.

Thank you so much for a wonderful session. I hope the rules and routines you introduce into your homes help make your household more manageable. Have a peaceful and happy day!
text:
Promé ku nos finalisá e módulo di awe ban Tuma un Pousa huntu. Kòrda ku esaki ta algu ku bo por hasi semper ora bo ta sinti bo di strès òf bo yunan ta iritá bo.

Mashá danki pa un seshon maravioso. Mi ta spera ku e reglanan i rutinanan ku boso ta introdusí den boso kasnan, lo yuda hasi boso hogar mas manehabel. Pasa un dia trankil i kontentu!

SourceText: Let’s look at how parents can use consequences with their children and teens:
text: Laga nos wak kon mayornan por usa konsekuensianan ku nan yunan i tinernan:

text: Laga nos wak un historia ku ta mustra kon bo por kambia atenshon di bo yunan for di komportashonnan negativo pa komportashon positivo promé ku nan bira pió.

text: Laga nos wak kon mayornan por usa konsekuensia ku nan yunan:

SourceText: Acknowledge the thumbs up with thumbs up, emojis, or quick words of praise.

SourceText: Message 1: Welcome
text: Mensahe 1: Bon Biní

SourceText: Allow time for parents to share. You should also share how you are feeling. For example, “I am excited to be part of the chat today, and I feel that excitement in my heart.”
text: Permití tempu pa mayornan kompartí. Bo tambe mester kompartí kon bo ta sinti. Por ehèmpel, “Mi ta entusiasmá pa ta parti di e kòmbersashon awe i mi ta sinti e emoshon ei den mi kurason.”

SourceText: Message 2: Reflection
text: Mensahe 2: Reflekshon

SourceText: Since we are having our last chat session, let’s take a few moments to reflect on our experience during the programme. Let’s share some of the things that we learned from the programme or ways that we and our children have changed.
text: Komo ku nos ta teniendo nos último seshon di kòmbersashon, laga nos tuma algun momentu pa reflehá riba nos eksperensia durante e programa. Laga nos kompartí algun di e kosnan ku nos a siña for di e programa òf maneranan ku nos i nos yunan a kambia.

SourceText: Give parents time to reflect and respond. You can encourage everyone to have a chance to write something in the chat. Remember to thank each parent for their contribution. If no parents respond, you can prompt by asking parents to share something they are proud of, or something that surprised them.
text: Duna mayornan tempu pa reflehá i respondé. Bo por enkurashá tur hende pa haña chèns di skirbi algu den e chat. Kòrda gradisí kada mayor pa nan aporte. Si ningun mayor ta kontestá, bo por instigá dor di pidi mayornan pa kompartí algu ku nan ta orguyoso di dje, òf algu ku a sorprendé nan.

SourceText: Message 3: Stone Soup
text: Mensahe 3: Sopi di Piedra

SourceText: Thank you for sharing. Now you can sit back and enjoy a story that we have shared at the end of all of our parenting programmes.
text: Danki pa kompartí. Awor bo por sinta i disfrutá di un kuenta ku nos a kompartí na final di tur nos programanan di edukashon familiar.

text: Mensahe 4: Diskushon tokante e sòpi di piedra

SourceText: What are some of the ingredients that we have in our group to continue supporting us as parents? In what ways can we continue to support each other after the end of the programme?
text: Kua ta algun di e ingredientenan ku nos tin den nos grupo pa sigui sostené nos komo mayor? Na ki maneranan nos por sigui sostené otro despues ku e programa terminá?

SourceText: Remember to give parents a chance to respond before moving on to the reflection
text: Kòrda duna mayornan un chèns pa reakshoná promé ku sigui pa e reflekshon

SourceText: Message 5: Offer for Questions about ongoing support through the group
text: Mensahe 5: Ofresé Espasio pa hasi pregunta tokante sosten kontinuo pa medio di e grupo

SourceText: Thank you to [Insert Name of New Group Administrator] who will be taking over as the group administrator. Do any of you have any questions about how you can continue to use the group going forward?
text: Danki na [Insert Name of New Group Administrator] ku lo tuma e tarea komo e atministradó di grupo. Tin un di boso ku tin pregunta tokante kon boso por sigui usa e grupo di awor pa dilanti?

SourceText: Allow a few minutes for parents to raise any questions. Remember to thank parents for their questions and let them take the lead in the ongoing planning for the group.
text: Permití algun minüt pa mayornan hasi kualke pregunta. Kòrda gradisí mayornan pa nan preguntanan i laga nan tuma e liderazgo den e planifikashon kontinuo pa e grupo.

SourceText: Message 6: Thank you & closing
text: Mensahe 6: Danki & klousura

SourceText:
Let’s close with an activity that is similar to Taking a Pause. Since it is the last module of the programme, we take this opportunity to reconnect with ourselves and our families through a sense of love and support.

Thank you and well done for completing the ParentChat programme! You have shown great love and commitment to your families by being here. It has been a pleasure to be on this journey with you.
text:
Laga nos sera ku un aktividat ku ta similar na Tuma un Pousa. Komo ku ta e último módulo di e programa, nos ta probechá di e oportunidat akí pa rekonektá ku nos mes i nos famianan pa medio di un sentido di amor i sosten.

Danki i boso a hasi un bon trabou pa a kompletá e programa di Mayor Konektá! Boso a mustra gran amor i kompromiso na boso famianan dor di ta akí. Tabata un plaser pa ta riba e biahe akí ku boso.

text: Bista General di Abilidatnan di Fasilitashon Efektivo

SourceText: 1️⃣ Use a collaborative approach to learning
text: 1️⃣ Usa un aserkamentu di kolaborashon pa siña

SourceText: 2️⃣ Model the behaviour you want to see
text: 2️⃣ Duna ehèmpel di e komportashon ku bo ke mira

SourceText: 3️⃣ Go at your parent’s pace
text: 3️⃣ Bai segun e ritmo di bo mayornan

SourceText: 4️⃣ Practice A-E-C-P: Accept, Explore, Connect, and Practice
text: 4️⃣ Praktiká A-E-K-P: Aseptá, Eksplorá, Konektá i Praktiká

SourceText: 5️⃣ Be aware of child developmental stages & milestones
text: 5️⃣ Tene kuenta ku e fasenan di desaroyo di mucha i logronan

SourceText: 6️⃣ Come prepared for each lesson
text: 6️⃣ Bin prepará pa kada lès

SourceText: 7️⃣ Make @global_prog.name a happy place to learn
text: 7️⃣ Hasi @global_prog.name un lugá dushi pa siña
note: The string @global_prog.name should not be translated.

SourceText: 8️⃣ Lastly, have fun!
text: 8️⃣ Por último, disfrutá!

SourceText: What is Safeguarding?
text: Kiko ta Protekshon Integral?

text: Siguiente

text: Kiko mi mester hasi durante e divulgashon di abusu, negligensia òf eksplotasho
